Getting Started

Where To Start

Get Started with Garlicoin

What Is Garlicoin

Learn the basics of Garlicoin.

Wallet

Setup a wallet in minutes on all platforms.

Mining

Learn to mine on the network using your CPU or GPU.

Changes

Get updates on Garlicoin and learn what you need to change in your setup

Explorer

Access the Garlicoin Block Explorer to see all the transactions.

Electrum (Recommended)

Get an easy to use wallet app for all platforms.

Windows Wallet

Setup a wallet in minutes on Windows.

Mac Wallet

Setup a wallet in minutes on Mac.

Linux Wallet

Setup a wallet in minutes on Linux.

Web Wallet

Get a wallet using the web client breadbox.

How To Mine

Learn the basics of mining and the different choices you will have to make.

Pool Mining

Learn more about pool mining, and the different pools that are available.

CPU

Learn to mine using your processor (CPU) on all platforms.

Windows Nvidia

Learn to mine using your Nvidia GPU on Windows with CCMiner.

Windows AMD

Learn to mine using your AMD GPU on Windows with YACMiner.

Linux GPU

Learn to mine using your Nvidia or AMD GPU on Linux.
